data.comment: Today's referee, Hajime Matsuo, has blown to start the match.
Throw-in for Nagoya in the half of Gamba.
In the minute 2, Gamba have a goal kick.
Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Nagoya in their own half.
In the minute 4, Nagoya awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Hajime Matsuo signals a Nagoya throw-in in Gamba's half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Suita.
In the minute 5, Gamba are pushing forward but Shu Kurata's finish is wide of the goal.
Hajime Matsuo awards Nagoya a goal kick.
Hajime Matsuo awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 8, Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Nagoya.
Ball safe as Gamba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Nagoya get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gamba's half?
In the minute 10, Nagoya needs to be cautious. Gamba have an attacking throw-in.
In Suita, Patric of Gamba is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Mu Kanazaki gets his shot on target but fails to score for Nagoya.
In the minute 11, Nagoya's Mateus misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Gamba at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Nagoya to take a throw-in in Gamba territory.
In the minute 12, In Suita a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball goes out of play for a Nagoya goal kick.
Throw-in for Nagoya in their own half.
In the minute 15, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Gamba are coming forward and Yosuke Ideguchi gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Nagoya have a goal kick.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Nagoya at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Gamba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Nagoya get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gamba's half?
In the minute 18, Free kick Gamba.
Hajime Matsuo awards Gamba a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Nagoya.
In the minute 21, Nagoya take a 0-1 lead thanks to Mu Kanazaki.
Takuji Yonemoto with an assist there.
Throw-in Nagoya.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Nagoya at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Free kick for Nagoya in the half of Gamba.
Gamba awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 28, Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
Free kick Gamba.
Gamba to take a throw-in in Nagoya territory.
In the minute 30, Ball safe as Nagoya is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in high up the field for Gamba in Suita.
Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Nagoya in their own half.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Gamba in their own half.
Throw-in for Gamba in the half of Nagoya.
Hajime Matsuo awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 35, In Suita a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ryu Takao (Gamba) gets a yellow card.
Mateus (Nagoya) gets in a shot â€“ but hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
In the minute 36, Throw-in for Nagoya close to the penalty box.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Gamba are whistled for offside.
In the minute 39, Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Gamba in their own half.
Nagoya have been awarded a corner by Hajime Matsuo.
Free kick for Gamba in their own half.
In the minute 41, Takuji Yonemoto is booked for the away team.
Hajime Matsuo waits before resuming play because Takuji Yonemoto for Nagoya is still down.
Hajime Matsuo signals a Gamba throw-in in Nagoya's half.
Throw-in for Gamba in the half of Nagoya.
In the minute 44, Massimo Ficcadenti (Nagoya) is making a first change, with Joao Schmidt replacing the possibly injured Takuji Yonemoto.
Hajime Matsuo signals a Gamba throw-in in Nagoya's half.
In the minute 45, Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Gamba's Ademilson gets in a shot on goal at Panasonic Stadium Suita. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
In the minute 46, Nagoya awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Gamba to take a throw-in in Nagoya territory.
Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Nagoya in their own half.
Hiroki Fujiharu is on a sub for Ryu Takao for Gamba.
In the minute 48, Can Nagoya capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Gamba's half?
Nagoya are pushing forward but Naoki Maeda's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Gamba at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
In the minute 51, Free kick for Gamba in the half of Nagoya.
Shinnosuke Nakatani for Nagoya has been booked by Hajime Matsuo and receives a first yellow card.
Yuki Yamamoto is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
In the minute 54, Throw-in Gamba.
Ball safe as Nagoya is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Suita.
Nagoya have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 58, The away team replace Yuki Soma with Gabriel Xavier.
Hiroyuki Abe is replacing Naoki Maeda for the away team.
In the minute 59, Hajime Matsuo signals a throw-in for Nagoya, close to Gamba's area.
Throw-in Gamba.
Ademilson (Gamba) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 60, Patric of Gamba smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Free kick for Gamba in their own half.
Nagoya make their fourth substitution with Ryogo Yamasaki replacing Mu Kanazaki.
In the minute 65, Ademilson for Gamba gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Nagoya goal kick.
Nagoya pushes forward through Ryogo Yamasaki, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 68, Throw-in high up the field for Gamba in Suita.
Hajime Matsuo awards Nagoya a goal kick.
Throw-in for Gamba in their own half.
In the minute 70, Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Gamba.
Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Suita Gamba attack through Patric. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 75, Ball goes out of play for a Nagoya goal kick.
Throw-in for Gamba at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Tsuneyasu Miyamoto is making the team's second substitution at Panasonic Stadium Suita with Takashi Usami replacing Ademilson.
In the minute 76, The home team replace Patric with Kazuma Watanabe.
Yasuhito Endo is on a sub for Yuki Yamamoto for Gamba.
Goal kick for Nagoya at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
In the minute 79, Nagoya will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Gamba.
Oh Jae-suk (Nagoya) has received a first yellow card.
Can Gamba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nagoya's half?
In the minute 80, Gamba have a dangerous throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Suita.
Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 84, Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Nagoya in their own half.
Nagoya have a goal kick.
Goal! The home team take a 2-1 lead through Takashi Usami.
In the minute 87, That's a fine assist from Yosuke Ideguchi.
Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
Gamba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kosuke Onose of Gamba gets in a strike, but is off target.
Nagoya have a goal kick.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Hajime Matsuo signals a throw-in for Gamba, close to Nagoya's area.
Hajime Matsuo awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Gamba at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Gamba push upfield but Hajime Matsuo quickly pulls them for offside.
Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
Gamba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Gamba awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-1.
